content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Yi-Nuo Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price for the apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: The final agreed rental price was 900 Euro.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1-10, how satisfied are you with the outcome? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: As the landlord, I would say my satisfaction with the outcome is a 10, as the rental price we agreed upon is satisfactory to me.
name: Peter Schmidt
